title: Womens Dress
title_original: Women Sheer Poncho Top Lightweight Knit Crochet Shrug Bolero Mesh Batwing Sleeve Sweater Cover Up Beachwear

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #29,912 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #2,103 in Women's Pullover Sweaters

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Pullovers

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the poncho top cute and well-made, appreciating its lightweight design. The neck hole receives mixed feedback, with one customer noting it's very small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Obsessed
items.body: Simply obsessed. So cute! Great quality! Snags a lil easy but no big deal. Big fan!!!! Read more
items.author: Scott

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Snags on jewelry
items.body: Very cute and light weight, staple top on my closet Read more
items.author: Matthew

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adds so much style and cute
items.body: Never thought it’d be into this but I am! It’s so cute and the perfect length/cut. It’s not too long which I was worried about. I am using it for EDC but also will keep it for different outfits! It’s the perfect little top to add to things and super lightweight. Read more
items.author: Skyler Hancock

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: Love this purchase!! It's perfect!! Exactly as photo shows! QUALITY! Read more
items.author: patricia

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars OK product, really thin
items.body: My daughter purchased this sheer poncho, and I wasn’t really impressed with the quality. It is very thin with a small hole for the neck opening. She should be able to wear it off the shoulder as the style intended and the cream color should be ok to go with everything. I think it was a little expensive for what she received but she is happy with it overall Read more
items.author: KELLYANN M. BUTTACI

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars cute,as pictured
items.body: cute beach cover up, light weight Read more
items.author: Courtney Montgomery

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Nicely made, quality product. Color is as indicated. Looks so cute on. Read more
items.author: NatSue

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a swimsuit coverup!
items.body: Really cute lightwear shrug for the beach or pool. Looks great paired with denim shorts or thrown over a strapless dress. Read more
items.author: lilybee

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: D-fashion Black, C-sheer Red, A-hollow Out Apricot, A-hollow Out White, A-cute Black, D-fashion Red, D-fashion Brown, D-fashion White, D-fashion Apricot, C-sheer Brown, C-sheer Black, C-sheer Purple, C-sheer Blue, C-sheer White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
